page.title: 02MUSLIMS AND ISLAM;THE MOSQUE
page.content: There are a lot of Muslims in Luton.A Muslim is a follower of the religion called {ISLAM.}The{QU'RAN}is the Holy Book of Muslims,who believe in the Prophets and helpers of{ALLAH}.Here are some of them;Adam,Eve,Moses,Jesus, Mohamed,and all the Angels.There are 5 prayers a day;they are named Fajer, Zahor,Asar,Maghrib and Isha.There are 5 pillars of Islam;they are Religion, Fasting,Helping the Poor,Prayer and Pilgrimage to{MECCA}.In Westbourne Rd we have nearly finished our{MOSQUE},it has a dome,a minaret,and two floors. The Imam,Qazi Abdul Aziz Chisti,is my father.He laid the first stone of the Mosque.S.J.Farrow were the builders.As far as I know,it cost a couple of million pounds.Fiday is our special day,like Sunday is Christians special day.The Imam does a speech.
